name: Deliciously Kawaii
description:
Deliciously Kawaii is a small Android game made by students in 2.5 days for the Global game Jam of January 2022.

Earn points by sorting salty and weet foods, buy upgrades and go as far as possible!

Crew:

Beguellel Qais: Rigging - Animation - VFX

Bonapersona Matteo: GD - Prog - UI -> https://masterofcookiez.itch.io/

Dangréaux Marie: Texture artist

Moine Manon: Artist - UI Artist

Paviolo Yoann:  Artist - UI Artist

Pissis Elisa: GD - UI - Narrative Design -> https://koicoy.itch.io/
